评论详情: I was so excited when they arrived. They were cute and comfy, and fit well.
Great pair of pants seem to be well-made used in dance and wear  around
They fit perfect and feel nice. They are light material but that's what I was looking for. Overall I would buy again.
I ordered these for my daughter who is 22. She looks awesome in these orange pants with a standard mid drift.  Glad to find something that she loves.
Christmas gift and kids love them
I’m 5,5 105 pounds 26 inch waist I got a medium and it fit just like the picture!
I have these in a medium. Geez!!! Waist is so tight. They’re cute, if you roll them down, they dont squeeze your tummy.
I got this pants for my teen son. He has the same pants for men’s size S, but it is too big, so I tried Women’s size S. To my surprise, the material is bette quality, my son is happy!
L am 71 years old and I love these pants..

I’m 5’ 6” and weigh about 130lbs. I’m a size 32 in mens and using the size guide, I got an XL. I might've gotten a size too big, but I really like how this fits. The pants are very comfy and its made out of the typical has parachute pant material. The pants are a bit on the thinner side, but it’s so that they are able to catch air and appear baggy. For this price point, these pants are pretty good compared to other places! I would order these again.
Fit to size and comfy
Comfortable, decent quality, thinner material…the kind that makes a little noise, true to size, and suuuper cute.
These are the worst quality pants I have ever bought. And they’re ugly to boot. Looks NOTHING like the picture.
Nice

I am just going to give individual scores to different things I feel are important to know before anyone orders these pants. Everyone has different fashion tastes.  Material. 5. It’s not too thin and it’s not winter heavy. It’s thick enough to stop a cold breeze and light enough to wear in summer. There is a slight stretch to the material. I'm really impressed with the quality.  Cut and fit. 5. The waist is a true small size. The fit is loose and on someone that is thin, it might be baggy. There is enough seat room to accommodate a larger behind. They are a nice, comfortable pair of pants.  Workmanship. 3. The seams and sewing are good. The design elements are not so good. All of the elastic drawstrings were tied together with ugly knots. The two pocket drawstrings are nonfunctioning and useless. The ankle hem has both wide elastic and the drawstrings, making it difficult to adjust them, plus they are so long I’d be afraid of tripping on them. Luckily, all those problems can be fixed simply by cutting and removing those drawstrings.  Overall, the pants are a good buy, especially if you enjoy casual clothes that are as comfortable as sweats but more upscale. They wash well, also.

I highly recommend that you size up in these pants as they do run a bit small. However, I really appreciated the color and how it doesn't make the typical 'squish squish' noise that pants of this type usually make. They were noisy but definitely not as noisy as other pants sound when you walk.  Also, if you have long legs amd have tramatic experiences with flooding in grade school, these may not be for you. I really wish that these came in a tall version.

Talk about 2000s jump back, these are great cargos they fit true to size and have specific stitching on the lower legs that make them lay in a certain way to give a slouch baggy look which is cool. The only down side is the ankles are huge and even if you cinch them in they are still huge with a long draw string. I wish they would make them a little small with a smaller drawstring so us short people aren’t tripping over such a long draw string you can tuck the up in the pants but it does fall back out with long wear. Other than that definitely a great buy!

This fits me a little tight since I do have a wider waist. I ordered a medium but would have preferred large. The waist band is elastic. It’s definitely not too long for me. I like the fact that I can adjust the length of each pant leg with their own drawstrings. I wouldn’t wear this for the summer, but would use it during the cold months.

评论概述: Amazing pockets, but not as baggy as expected
评论详情: Wore these for a 2000s themed party and was slightly disappointed that these pants didn’t have the baggy look like most outfits of that time did. If you have thicker thighs like me, I suggest you size up if you want a loose fit. Despite this, the pants were quite comfy and had plenty of space in the pockets, so no need to carry a purse around

I love the fit and style of these cargo pants. The fabric is lightweight which is perfect for summer weather. The pants fits as expected but they are a little short. They land right at the ankle and I am 5 feet 7 inches tall. Easy to hide the length once I have shoes on. The adjustable cord at the bottom of the pants gives me some versatility.

These cargo pants are so stylish! The material is very thin and lightweight. Great for hot days and traveling. I’m 5’7 and size M fits me perfectly. The only issue is the wrinkles are hard to get rid of. I washed it and it still look the same. I’ll try to iron it tomorrow.
Fit as expected. True to size. The beige has a slight light green tint to it. But they look really cool and are on trend.

I was nervous about ordering these parachute pants because they are out of my comfort zone, However, I am glad I did! They are super cute and very comfy. They look great with an oversized vintage tshirt or crop top. Platform sneakers also give them life. They are comfy and make the swishing noise when you walk.

these pants are super cute and made out of a raincoat like material. they aren't very stretchy, but do have some give to them. for mid/plus size buyers you might want to upsize if you have bigger thighs, the pants fit fine in the waist and lower leg but my thighs don't allow the baggy style fit. even with that being said they still look super cute on!

I was surprised to find that these are actually pretty cool (temperature) when wearing them. The waistband is a little tight but that could be solved by ordering up one size, which I think is probably unnecessary. They kind of remind me of Japanese or Korean street fashion, which is kind of what I was going for.
Check the measurements for the right fit. Great quality get style.
These are nice, lightweight pants. I work food events outside and have to wear black pants. These look good and keep me much cooler than other pants. Lots of pockets too!
Fits true to size and well made.

Got this for daughter who is 5’4 tall and weights 100lbs, it fits her great. She said it’s comfortable and easy to move around in. It’s lightweight and thin, perfect for summer wear. You can style it with pretty much anything. Easy to wear. Great for lounging. Trendy. Recommend.
Nice quality pants and fits well. They're baggy like they're supposed to be but not too baggy. Would recommend.
Super baggy (like the rave scene in the 1990's), thin material is breathable. Adjustable drawstrings and large pockets. Fits true to size.
These are cute cargo pants. Lightweight and comfortable. True to size. Definitely a throwback to the 90s!
I ordered these pants for my daughter and she loves them. They fit as expected and we followed the guidelines on the size chart. They are comfortable, look good, and are great for summer casual wear.
Love these pants and the oversized baggy look. The material is great, they fit as expected with a stretch to them. Great item to play with in terms of style.
Fits as expected, looks great, love it!
These pants are nice but they are a big too short for me. My height is 5”6’ and I weigh about 185 pounds. These are better for those who are shorter or just don’t mind the length as it is.

I thought these were cute but I dont think I would buy again. The material is itchy and very thick/heavy. They arent very comfortable and came in a size too small. I dont think they are worth the money.
